snippet: Since Tim Duncan joined Coach Gregg Popovich in San Antonio, the Spurs have been contenders or champions every season. Still, missed opportunities — the 2013 finals, in particular — haunt Popovich.
abstract: Harvey Araton On Basketball column observes that since San Antonio Spurs coach Gregg Popovich and center Tim Duncan partnered in 1997, team has vied for or won championship 17 times over three decades; notes that Popovich feels relief after a win rather than euphoria.
lead_paragraph: Since Tim Duncan joined Coach Gregg Popovich in San Antonio, the Spurs have been contenders or champions every season. Still, missed opportunities — the 2013 finals, in particular — haunt Popovich.

headline.print_headline: For Spurs’ Coach, Contention Is Constant, but Relief Is Fleeting
headline.seo: After Five Titles With San Antonio Spurs, Gregg Popovich Remains Haunted by Missed Chances
headline.main: A Little Solace Amid a Lot of Winning
